Content.Text:
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
*Yawn*...Good morning, <MYNAME>. Mmmm, I'm
still a little sleepy. My eyes are
blurry.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Oh, your hair is
all tousled. Let's try to look our best,
shall we?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. When I see your
smiling face it always cheers me up!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Are you taking a break
from work?
<PAGE>
Stop by to see my magic once in a while.
I've got some magic tricks that will
amaze you, <MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You work so hard every
day. Be sure to take a break every now
and then!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I'm thinking up new magic
routines. Not as easy as it might sound!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I think better at
night. I'm about to hit my stride! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Nights are nice
because it's quiet. Magic practice
requires concentration, after all.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. What did you do
all day today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hmm, me...? Well, that's a secret<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I didn't notice you at all.
What are you doing here?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. What? Don't stare
at me like that. It's embarrassing.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You look great
again today, <MYNAME> Work hard! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I didn't notice you at all.
What are you doing here?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Say, do I look cute
today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I do? I'm so glad  I'm going to
become even cuter, just for you. You can
Look forward to it! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Let me know whenever you
want to see magic. I'll excite you! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I didn't notice you at all.
What are you doing here?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Say, how was your
day today? Did work go well?
<PAGE>
I want to know everything about you,
<MYNAME>. So don't hide anything from me,
okay?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. I practiced too
much today and I'm exhausted. I'd need
something to wash away my fatigue.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What? Come on, don't stare like that.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mmm, I'm sleepy. Because of you, <MYNAME>,
I always get up so early.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you feel bad, then make lots of money
again today! If you do, I might forgive
you.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Don't you think I
look cute again today?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>*Giggle* Right? You're so lucky to be
able to look at such a cute wife every
day.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Instead of stopping to talk
to me, get to work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>
I don't know if you'll believe this, but
I love to see you working! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I'm bored today. Finish up
work quickly and let's have some fun.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you worked hard today!  So,
how much money did you make?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If you want to continue as my husband,
you should bring home at least 100,000 G
daily, okay? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I'm so tired today. I
worked too hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So finish up the rest of the work today,
okay? You'll do it, right? *Giggle* I
love you, <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sun feels so warm today There are
the best days for performing and
watching magic.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like rainy days, yet hate them. I can
get ahead on my magic practice, but this
weather ruins my hair.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's so hot... I don't feel like doing
anything. Staying inside and cooling off
is best on days like this!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like summer rain. It usually makes a
rainbow, like a magical illusion.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The blue skies are pretty today. Beauty
touches all five senses. So amazing! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm...it's a little chilly. It's rough
working in this. Better take care to
not catch a cold.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't the snowscape lovely? It's so
sparkly, like you're surrounded by
jewels. How romantic! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When the surroundings are all white, I
feel like adding colors. Just like when
I'm performing magic.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Typhoons are exciting!  I love that
feeling that you don't know what's going
to happen next! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Snowstorms are exciting!  I love that
feeling that you don't know what's going
to happen next! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Typhoons are funny! Seeing you try to
keep up with the typhoon is always good
for a giggle, <MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Snowstorms are funny! Seeing you try to
keep up with the snow is always good for
a giggle, <MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME> I hear you found someone
special? How lucky. I'm jealous! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wish I could find someone special.
*Giggle* I wish you every happiness!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Forests are fun. I never tire of looking
at them. Watching the animals and
bugs give me ideas for my magic!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a peaceful in the forest. A lively
town is nice, but I also like soothing
places like this! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The wind feels so nice. Performing magic
is very stressful, so this makes a nice
break.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The circus I worked with when I was
learning magic often camped on the
riverside.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>So except when we had shows in town, we
always ate fish. Just thinking about
it makes me cringe.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmmm... Walking along a mountain path is
hard on the legs. Maybe I shouldn't have
come. I'm too thirsty to go on!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like it here because not many people
come around. A world without people
can be nice!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never had much to do with farms until
now. Thanks to you, I get to experience
something new!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at all that land! So impressive.
More things are going to be built,
right? I can't wait

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Jewels are so pretty. I wish I had some!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Setting magic in unfamiliar places like
can make it even more exciting. Maybe
I'll try it out sometime.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been to many towns to perform my
magic, but this town is definitely one
the easiest to live in that I've seen.
<PAGE>
Big cities have too many people and
rural places are too boring. This kind
of town is the best.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is quite lively. I wish there
were even more people, though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I mean, I want more people to see my
magic!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The number of people living here have
really increased. I hope I can perform
for lots of people! 
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Wouldn't it be nice if the town keeps
growing like this?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad the town has revived. I get
to perform my magic for so many people!
So gratifying!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What we have to do now is work hard to
keep them all here. Let's all do our
best!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to have an extraordinary
day, come see my magic!  I'll take you
to a wonderful world! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, do you like to play cards? If so,
I'd like to challenge you. Of course,
it's a serious game, with a wager. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm seen by many people during my work,
so I'm always on my game.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>An idol needs to be more than the every-
day, doesn't she? Well, it's the same
with magicians. Image is important!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have a younger brother. I haven't seen
in many years... but I long to see him
again. I wonder what he's doing now.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You only have one life to live, so I
want to try all sorts of things! 
Don't you agree?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was a magician's apprentice, I
encountered jealousy and hard a rough
time. I'm glad I made it through!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, I think I can show you my true
self. That's how much I trust you! <RED>∀</RED> 
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>A magician has lots of secrets and I may
shock you often, but it will surely
bring us closer.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hmm... Maybe I jumped the gun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, don't worry. It's nothing. Just
talking to myself.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, you don't pamper me at all. It's
getting kind of boring.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dating someone can be embarrassing! <RED>∀</RED>
How do you feel, <MYNAME>? Does it excite
you?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My fans found out I have a boyfriend.
But everyone said, "We'll always support
you, Michelle!" <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So now we can go out in public, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Until now, I've kept myself apart from
others, but now I can be honest about
my feelings with you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love to be spoiled! <RED>∀</RED> Will you spoil
me more? *Giggle* I love you

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What I love about you most, <MYNAME>, is
your kindness!
<PAGE>
You accept whatever I do and make me
feel very safe... You have something
that no other man has shown me! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love you, <MYNAME>! I think I'm going to
stick with you forever and ever! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
Please continue to love all of me! 
*Giggle*... <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...You creep me out. Please, don't talk
to me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, I'm so bored. I want more
excitement! I should never have gotten
married.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You've been so cold to me lately,
<MYNAME>. And I'm being so considerate of
you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>If you're not going to cherish me, maybe
I'll go and date someone else? Do you
need to be threatened before you'll act?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm married now, so I've lost some fans.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I'm much happier now, so it's not like
it really bothers me!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I married, I don't do magic just
for the money. I'm doing the kind of
magic I want to perform.
<PAGE>
It's been so long since I truly enjoyed
magic. This is thanks to you, too,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never been able to do work that I
love without worrying about money...
until now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad I have a husband! You're the
best, <MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love you, <MYNAME>. Thank you for
everything.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>What? You want to hear that again?
*Giggle* You're so childish<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* Every day is going to be such
fun!  <MYNAME>, I'm counting on you! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're both adults, so let's just forget
the past. I hope we can stay friendly!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* I think happy days are ahead!
<MYNAME>, please take good care of me!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't want an extravagant wedding. But
I do have big expectations once we are
married! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have to play so meek and cute with
everyone else, it's nice to have someone
I can really be myself around!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Don't worry, I'm still meek and cute 
with everyone else! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I feel so heavy! I don't feel like doing
anything. So... can you take care of the
house?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Think of the baby growing inside me and
work as though you need to feed five
from now on! The more money the better!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Me, with a family. I haven't experienced
that in so long... It feels strange.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Please do your best, <MYNAME>, for the
sake of our child! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This child looks just like me! <RED>∀</RED> I'm
sure she'll be so popular when she's
older.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Recently, I've been amusing <CHILD_NAME> with
magic. Our child loves it and has a keen
eye for a good trick!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I asked <CHILD_NAME>, who do you love more,
Mom or Dad? The answer was "Both!"
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>What a precocious child. Where does that
come from, do you think?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bring able to see <CHILD_NAME> getting so
big... what a delight.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A present for me? *Giggle* This is my
favorite Thank you! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
This <ITEMNAME0> looks delicious. I could
eat this every day!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* <RED>∀</RED> I absolutely love this.
Thank you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* <RED>∀</RED> That's a lovely present.
Thank you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...I don't care too much for this. Next
time, can you give me something else?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I really don't care for this... What am
I going to do with a <ITEMNAME0>?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is my least favorite thing ever,
in the world, ever! Never bring me this
again!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a big <ITEMNAME0>!  It's great.
Maybe I'll use it in a magic trick.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>*Giggle* I'm just kidding. Not to worry,
I'll eat it. It looks yummy, so I'm
looking forward to it already! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's big, isn't it? I wonder if I can
eat this by myself? Not sure I can
stomach quite this much...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But it's a present and I appreciate your
thoughtfulness. Thank you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...It's big, isn't it? Actually, I
really don't like this...
<PAGE>
This is going to be an unforgettable
present... on many levels.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<ITEMNAME0>! I'll share it with the
people who come to see my next show! 
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I mean, it looks so delicious! I'm sure
everyone will enjoy it! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uhhh...I don't like this. And it's so
huge.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Uhhh...I really hate this. And it's so
huge...

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Thank you, but no thanks. I really don't
want this. I'm sorry.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Thank you, but no thanks. I really don't
want this. I'm sorry.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't need anything from you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I only accept one present each day. So
come again tomorrow...!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I only accept one present each day. So
come again tomorrow...!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be honest, I'd love more, but I'd
better stop. I don't want to develop a
reputation for being greedy.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
...Lovely! Nothing beats this as a
birthday cake! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
If it means more <ITEMNAME0>, I wish
every day was my birthday. Thank you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Lovely! You know what I like!  That
makes me happy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's nice to get birthday presents that
you love, after all!  Thank you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is something I like!  It's the
perfect birthday present! Thank you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm happy with anything for my birthday
present!  Thank you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This is my birthday present? Too bad...
I was expecting something else. Still,
thanks.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This is my birthday present? I was
hoping for something else. I'm a bit
disappointed.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is my birthday present? Of all
things, why the one thing I hate the
most?
<PAGE>
...So this is how you feel? How cruel.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* Thank you!  I'm so happy that
I received <ITEMNAME0> for my birthday!
<PAGE>
And it looks delicious! <RED>∀</RED> I can't wait
to eat it.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This... is my birthday present?! Of all
things, why this?
<PAGE>
And such a big one, too...  Tell me this
is just a dream! A nightmare!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
This... is my birthday present?! Of all
things, why this?
<PAGE>
And such a big one, too... How cruel.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
*Giggle* Thank you!  I'm so happy to
get something this big for my birthday!
<RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I know just how you feel about me,
<MYNAME>!  Thank you remembering me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Could this be my birthday present? Thank
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>
...But it's so big. I'm not so keen on
it, so I'm not sure if I can eat it all.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Could this be my birthday present? Thank
you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>
...But it's so big. I don't even like
small ones! This is going to haunt me.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like chicks!  They're still so small
and cute. Grow up quickly now!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't believe they lay eggs every day.
That's amazing.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such a big bird. You're very good,
laying lots of eggs every day.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dogs are so obedient. They're cute and
get so attached to their masters.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't your dog a bit overweight? I think
you need to start a diet.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dogs are so obedient. They're cute and
get so attached to their masters.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't your dog a bit overweight? I think
you need to start a diet.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like cats because they're capricious.
*Giggle*, oh how cute! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So fluffy and cute! <RED>∀</RED> That's one fat
cat, but still very cute! Lovely!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like cats because they're capricious.
*Giggle*, oh how cute! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So fluffy and cute! <RED>∀</RED> That's one fat
cat, but still very cute! Lovely!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...A present? Oh, that's right. Today's
the Flower Festival!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'll cherish it!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...A present? Oh, that's right. Today's
the Flower Festival!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Getting flowers from a man is so nice.
And doubly so when that man is someone
you love. Thank you, <MYNAME><RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...A present? Oh, that's right. Today's
the Flower Festival!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This is like your symbol of love,
<MYNAME>. You can bring me one every day,
if you like! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A Harmony Day present? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A Harmony Day present? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This candy expresses your feelings for
me, right? I can't wait until next year
already! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
*Giggle*. A Harmony Day present?
<PAGE>
It seems small in scope compared to
your love for me... But it looks
delicious, so you're forgiven! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a present for the Pumpkin
Festival? I appreciate being considered
so young, but I'm too old for this!
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>...But the candy looks good. You know
what, I'll accept. Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Could this be a present for the Pumpkin
Festival? Umm, <MYNAME>...do you really
think of me as a child?
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>If you're going to tease me like this,
maybe I'll show you my adult self. I'm
not sure you could handle me! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm just joking. But I'll accept the
gift. Thank you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this a present for the Pumpkin
Festival? I think the roles should be
reversed, don't you agree?
<PAGE>
